Question.Subject: Are there any sites like itwillbeheard.blogspot?
Question.Content: The site got shut down, are there any similar sites?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I've never heard of it... but a google search showed something about MP3s and music.
If you're looking to just listen to music while you're online, check out http://www.grooveshark.com/ It's pretty easy to use and it has a HUGE library of songs.
If you're looking to download MP3s, I'd buy them. But if you need to try out the full mp3 on your computer first ;) try http://www.emp3world.com/
They're both search-based, so you should know what song you want before going there. If you want to discover music, try pandora or last.fm.
Hope this helps!
Lucien Briscoe

Answer.Content:
I've never heard of it... but a google search showed something about MP3s and music.
If you're looking to just listen to music while you're online, check out http://www.grooveshark.com/ It's pretty easy to use and it has a HUGE library of songs.
If you're looking to download MP3s, I'd buy them. But if you need to try out the full mp3 on your computer first ;) try http://www.emp3world.com/
They're both search-based, so you should know what song you want before going there. If you want to discover music, try pandora or last.fm.
Hope this helps!
Lucien Briscoe
